name: Flipt Puzzle
description:
Flipt Puzzle is a relaxing memory and logic tiling puzzle game portrayed on a castle floor.

Take ten seconds or less to commit the pattern to memory. Arrange the puzzle shapes in the correct pattern to solve
the puzzle. Easy!

- fifty unique puzzle patterns
- intuitive: swipe to change tiles
- statistics such as time and moves
- minimalist 3D provides a board game appearance
- leaderboard and achievements
- unlimited retries
